reviews.title: Best price anywhere for an all steel chait
reviews.review_text: I had previously purchased 2 of these chairs from my Walmart store over a year ago. We use them daily for chair exercises and also when extra seating is needed. MThey are still like new. This 4 pack is not only the best value available for a medium duty chair ( checked online with Amazon and other merchants) but they are the same quality as my other chairs. This means I can look forward to them serving my needs for an extended period of time. Best price by a long shot and good quality for the price.

reviews.title: Easy and fast
reviews.review_text: Cheapest set of metal chairs I could find, I shopped around places like Amazon, Lowe's and many others. They were a decent price as I didn't want to pay too much for metal chairs that will only be used a couple times a year. They worked perfect for our needs of extra seating for a birthday party.

reviews.title: Metal Chairs, What Else! üëçüèª
reviews.review_text: Exactly what I needed. Packaged well to ensure its safely arrived too. I want to recommend but y'all might buy it all and I won't get anymore left lol jk but it's good. I recommend.

reviews.title: Sturdy seating for guests of all sizes
reviews.review_text: Loved being able to select multiples of 4 chairs at a lower price and have all delivered at the same time . Perfect for my small dinner party. Sturdy enough to seat guests of all sizes comfortably.

reviews.title: Replacement chairs
reviews.review_text: Bought these for a friend. She was surprised. They were a replacement for some that I borrowed from her and left out in the rain. So far, she hasn't had anything bad to say about them.

reviews.title: Great buy!
reviews.review_text: We bought these chairs for holiday dinners and I really like them. It's a basic chair but not as heavy as the older chairs like this. It holds up under bigger people too!
I initially purchased these for when we went camping. They did their job, even had to use them as a step stool to hang up a few things. So I can definitely say they're sturdy.

reviews.title: Great chairs for when you need them
reviews.review_text: Good chairs for the price. Even better that it is a 4 pack. They do the job. Very light but can hold a good amount of weight. Great set for having extra chairs for when you need them

reviews.title: Buyer Beware
reviews.review_text: Cheaply made. Welds on front rung detached making the chair unsafe. Steel is so thin that there are dents on the front of every single chair in this four-piece set. paint got scratched when someone with rivets in their jeans scooched across the front of the seat.

The copy needs to be fixed on this...it says 2pk, but you only receive 1 pkg. So while they look nice and all, i didnt get the number I needed. i will need to return and hope the store doesnt give me trouble on it!

reviews.title: Great chair at a great price!
reviews.review_text: These are wonderful chairs for the price. I love the tan color which matches just about any affair. We have used them multiple times and they still look new. :)
The chairs are durable and fold and unfold easily. They are all metal so they will last a long time, we've been using them as our regular chairs for the last 6 months.

reviews.title: Not bad cheap chairs
reviews.review_text: Cheapest best chairs I've found. Fairly durable, withstood one party so far without breaking. They are metal but feel a little flimsy. They did arrive with a small dent in all chairs in one of the box of 4. Each dent is visible on the front side of the chairback. Will probably buy more of these, have bought two boxes of four so far.

reviews.title: What are you waiting for? Buy Them!
reviews.review_text: These came in handy! They are sturdy. I love the color. They are light to carry but still hold up very well. And you can't beat the price. I ordered 4 sets of 4 for a party and, needless to say, I will not be renting chairs anymore. If you are on skeptical, don't be! Get them!

reviews.title: THESE ARE QUALITY CHAIRS.....BUT....
reviews.review_text: These black steel chairs are sturdy and is of good quality....but....they have no cushion for comfort if that is what you are looking for...It's all good ...the price is right and I recommend that you purchase them...THEY ARE GOOD QUALITY CHAIRS....Chris Morrison.....Carson, CA.....8/26/22

reviews.title: A must have!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these chairs. Ordered 6, to have for family gatherings and/or parties. Love the black color the durability and easy to fold away. Kept the boxes for storage. Goes great with the black tables I also purchased. Crisp clean elegant conformed look.

reviews.title: Good old folding chairs.
reviews.review_text: These things shipped quickly and arrived just in time for Thanksgiving. The last time I purchased a metal chair like this was from Lowes' about 10 years ago for around $9. Considering that was a decade ago, these are not bad at all for $11.25 each delivered free to my house with Walmart . The thing I love about Walmart compared to Amazon is that they know how to charge the correct tax rate. Some large online retailers charge a negotiated tax rate for each state. For example, Alabama's is 8%. That's cheaper that some cities rate in Alabama. I don't live in a city though. My tax rate should only be 5%. I love that Walmart puts forth the effort to get it right and get the money to the correct places. I know that has nothing to do with the chairs, I just wanted to point that our. Buy stuff from Walmart when you can instead of Amazon. Back to the chairs, they are decent quality and sturdy. I'm 6'2" and weigh about 260lbs and I feel very secure sitting in these chairs, unlike some of the plastic folding chairs that I'm afraid I will break.

reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
reviews.review_text: With limited space I needed extra chairs for dinner guests that I can put away. These portable folding chairs were everything that I expected but more. They're steel and very well made. They have weight to them but are not overly heavy. The polished finish is very nice and smooth. The seat may be too small for a hefty adult especially if they need more depth but otherwise should do the job. I am 5"10 and the chair makes me sit up pretty straight. I am especially pleased with them for what I need them to do. Entertain and put them away. Delivery went well all things considered too. They were very fairly priced too. Provided they hold up, I feel I got great value for my money.

I ordered 8 chairs, 4 to a box. One box perfect. The second box had legs bent. Chairs were not wrapped in plastic. Looked as though they had been purchased and returned and then shipped to us. Trying to find out how to contact someone for replacement. Not very satisfied with one box.

reviews.title: Great Product, Seamless Order
reviews.review_text: I don't normally give reviews, so that should tell you how happy I was with this whole purchase from start to finish. The product is good quality, the online order was seamless, and these VERY heavy boxes were left on my doorstep two days after I ordered them, just in time for my grandkids' birthday party. What more could you want?

Came quickly. Very nice. They are about as comfortable as metal folding chairs can be. Might consider getting some cushions for them. However my dad did have to stand in one to hang some thing and it help him like a champ. Very sturdy and he is over 225lbs.

reviews.title: Comfy sturdy chairs
reviews.review_text: These chairs are great quality at a great price! I needed chairs for my sons graduation and took a chance buying them hoping they were "ok".. truth be told i am impressed how awesome they are.. ty for this awesome product! And super fast delivery too!!
I thought of buying these individually but this price for 4 was a great deal! And I'm buying another set.

reviews.title: Nice chairs
reviews.review_text: They came neatly pack no assembly needed just like the picture very comfortable easy to carry great for indoors and outdoor
These chairs were awesome. Fast delivery and great quality. Definitely worth ordering again. Thank you
the chairs bending very easy, not very strong for a 8 year and 11 year old boys! I would buy these again

reviews.title: Good For Us Big Girls
reviews.review_text: As a plus-size person... these chairs hold very steady, and there is no buckle or bend to them. I will be purchasing more!
I needed folding chairs quickly and these were the cheapest I found. They arrived quickly and required no assembly. Obviously not crazy quality but fit what I need them for
Only problem was delivery was terrible. They were for Thanksgiving and Billy made it on time causing a lot of anxiety because I was having family over for dinner and needed the extra seating.

reviews.title: Every home must have a few! Easy to carry!
reviews.review_text: Very lightweight but sturdy and stable. Doesn't tip over if the person sitting on it moves even the slightest to the side, unlike another seller's foldable chairs.
I gave the rating I did because I‚Äùm really satisfied with the product and price. Only had one hiccup that this product was delayed due to not being available at my local distributor.

reviews.title: sturdy
reviews.review_text: Came extremely fast. We use them for our dining room chairs cause they seem to be sturdier then any other chair we purchase for the table. Plus we can fold them up when we are not using them.

reviews.title: Reasons for me to purchase more of these chairs.
reviews.review_text: We kept running out of seating at our gatherings, so I ordered a set of 4. They are easy to set up and put away. They take up very little storage space. If you want more comfort, just order the cushions to tie on.

reviews.title: Mainstays Steel Folding Chair (4-Pack), Black Revi
reviews.review_text: MY FAMILY KEEPS "BORROWING" MY STEEL FOLDING CHAIRS! They're the best multi-use, easy to clean, and store chairs ever! If THIS review doesn't tip you off to how wonderful these chairs are, nothing will!

reviews.title: Grab a seat!
reviews.review_text: These metal folding chairs were a great value! Very easy to store and sturdy. Just what I needed for additional seating for a family function. The price can't be beat!

reviews.title: Great for game nights!
reviews.review_text: I needed a few more chairs for game night. These were perfect. They are easy to store away when not needed. I'm a very large man and these held up for me. The construction is top notch.
The chair are a Christmas gift. I did open the box to make sure they were the right color and it was! They are very sturdy and well built! Delivery was very fast! I think he will enjoy them!

reviews.review_text: I just received my folding chairs, sat on one and it creaked. It seemed like a bad omen. I am of average weight, so it should not be creaking already. Hopefully they'll last a while. Only time will tell.

reviews.title: great buy!
reviews.review_text: Tired of borrowing stuff for parties or renting and returning. SO worth purchasing and having on hand for big get togethers in my home. Nicely finished and light weight but sturdy. Very happy with my decision to own my own party chairs!

reviews.title: It's a sturdy chair - for a great price.
reviews.review_text: This is your basic folding chair. Solid, well build, all steel and well finished. Using them for additional seating in the house and for outdoor presentations. Great price, fast shipping and they arrived in great shape.

reviews.title: Great Chairs
reviews.review_text: These chairs are a little short but very strong and steady. Folding them up makes it so easy to store them. I also love the black color. Will work great for my son's wedding reception.

reviews.title: Quality is awesome
reviews.review_text: These folding chairs have been around in my household for many many years by various manufacturers. Mainstays did not let me down, sturdy, well made and durable. I have been caught off guard by others of lesser quality and actually not safe enough to support adult weight, but these are exactly the way I remember them. I expect these will last just the same as the ones I was raised with.

reviews.title: Can't beat the price and free shipping!
reviews.review_text: beautiful chairs to go with my card table to seat extra family members coming for Thanksgiving. Sturdy and shipped in one day. Excellent pricing, better than Amazon. I am thoroughly happy with Walmart's new approach to selling, shipping and pricing.

reviews.title: Chairs were great but late
reviews.review_text: The chairs are nice for the price. I ordered early to make sure they'd come in time for my event. Instead they came extremely late and I had to purchase chairs at another place at the last minute. They arrived 2 days after the event with no explanation why shipping was late.

reviews.review_text: These are our standby chairs for use through the house and are great for when company comes and you need extra seating. reviews.title: Great for extra seating
reviews.review_text: I ordered these chairs for game mother at my house .. they are sturdy and easy to fold and unfold

reviews.title: Love these chairs
reviews.review_text: Great chairs for parties with a large table.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: I love the fact that my order arrived ontime, and the customer service was great.

reviews.title: OK'ish for the price range
reviews.review_text: I like the product, but the issue is the Sturdiness %26 strength. The bead welds crack and the support cross bar on the bottom gave away. If you have HEAVY set friends and or family, this folding chair is not rated for them. I have a lot of HEAVY set family members and I had to warn them how flimsy this "metal" chairs can be.

reviews.title: They're folding chairs.
reviews.review_text: They're quite sturdy and your dinner guests can put their bottoms on them instead of sitting on the floor!
I have no idea about the products quality because it did not arrive on time. I still do not have it.

reviews.title: Very nice for the money
reviews.review_text: I am very pleased with the quality for the great price. I am a big guy 220lbs and these chairs are very sturdy. The actual weight rating is 225lbs.

reviews.title: Great chairs
reviews.review_text: Was skeptical with the price of these chairs but needed a quick fix for extra seating with company for dinner. Very happy with chairs Comfortable, sturdy and seem like good quality

reviews.title: Sturdy and good size
reviews.review_text: Bought for holidays to add seating. They came all 4 in one box, wrapped in indivdual plastic. They worked good for the younger kids, older kids and Adults. They were not bent or scratched and looked good for the use.

reviews.title: Great sturdy folding chairs.
reviews.review_text: These are durable folding chairs and I like that they are black to match the folding table. I'm certain they will hold up for many years for our family holiday get togethers.

reviews.title: Sturdy and Attractive
reviews.review_text: The chairs were exactly what I needed for my adult students to sit in for some breakout workshops. I may need another set as we expand. Would definitely buy them again.

reviews.title: Great chairs
reviews.review_text: Ordered these 4 days or so before Thanksgiving. First, we got them the next day. The chairs are sturdy and the right size for a folding table. The best price for them too. I'm very pleased with this purchase. I would buy the again if needed.

reviews.title: Very sturdy!
reviews.review_text: These chairs were packed nicely with no dents or dings. They had no wobble to them and they are very sturdy! Definitely glad that I purchased these!!!

reviews.title: Folding chairs that fit the bill
reviews.review_text: Previously purchased these chairs and was very pleased. We needed extra seating for Thanksgiving, so I bought more. They do the job, and the price is very reasonable.

reviews.title: Great quality for the price
reviews.review_text: These are so nice to have around for extra seating when I have guests over. You can never have too many chairs and these are easy to fold up and put away when not in use.

reviews.title: Easy to store away
reviews.review_text: Nicely made black folding chairs. These chairs arrived just in time for the holiday gathering I'd planned. The extra seating came in handy, and the chairs are so easy to store away until needed again.

reviews.title: Quick Extra Seating
reviews.review_text: I bought these and had them sent to my cousins home where we have all our big family gatherings. They arrived quickly and on time and were comfortable and easily open and fold as you need.

reviews.title: Great price and material!
reviews.review_text: I do decorations nd this chair last along time if you take good care of them! I recommend this product.On the picture I have them cover for my decorations.

reviews.title: Great Buy
reviews.review_text: The chairs were suprisingly sturdy and worked perfectly for extra seating at our Thanksgiving dinner. And then again for my daughters birthday party. I folded them back up and keep in original box for storage. These were definitely worth the buy

reviews.title: great extra chairs
reviews.review_text: Needed extra chairs for Thanksgiving gathering. Didn't want to pay a lot for them. These chairs are well made for the price. I am well pleased with them.

reviews.title: Love these, perfect for family functions
reviews.review_text: Awesome to have for family and friends when you have limited space for furniture, yet they fold away to a closet. Three boxes fit in small coat closet.

I looked in-store and found the quality to be what I expected for the price. The size of folding chair will store easily in my space. Color is exactly what I was looking for. Delivery was ideal since I was ordering more than could fit in my car.

reviews.title: Could not ask for a better deal for my card table.
reviews.review_text: I am completely satisfied with the purchase of my chairs and quick turn-a-round time in the process and delivery time. The chairs are sturdy and exactly what I needed for my matching table.

reviews.title: metal chair
reviews.review_text: rapid delivery after order places. Item not damaged. Eval of metal folding chair disclosed a strong frame and folding/opening mechanism. Similar chairs stack perfectly. Color is uniform and pleasing. Price is the best on the market and the least expensive online. Overall rating 10/10

reviews.title: Great quality-Great price
reviews.review_text: Four steel (metal) chairs for $39.99. I thought to myself "you get what you pay for". When I received the chairs, I noticed that they were solid (heavy in weight and sturdy). They stay folded and fold up easily and when I sat on the chair (I weigh 210 lbs.) the chair did not make a noise (squeaking/popping/straining/etc.). Very good buy!

reviews.title: nice chairs
reviews.review_text: Durable. Easy to unfold. Great size. Will purchase more

This product is very sturdy and perfect for when i have more guests than i have furniture.

reviews.title: Nice chair

reviews.title: Satisfied purchase !
reviews.review_text: Purchase quickly %26 correctly delivered as ordered with no damage. Chairs seem sturdy %26 well built. Pleased !

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review_text: The chairs are as the appear in the photo, the delivery was in pieces but I still got them in a timely fashion i love my purchase!
Order was EXACTLY how I ordered. Everything was perfect, especially for this holiday season when you have more people over and need an extra chair.

reviews.title: delivery error
reviews.review_text: they delivered at the wrong house. luckily my neighbor at 2207 was honest and told me my delivery was at their home
These are great for what we want They will probably chip paint easily, but we need them for overflow
these were amazing for baby shower and my chair covers fit perfectly thank you so much for quality product
Everything was great, I just wish there was a discount when buying 84 chairs at once. Or at least a veteran discount.
